title: Acer Swift 3 (2022): Release date, price, and everything you need to know
content:
Acer recently introduced the latest generation of the Swift 3, one of its most popular mainstream laptops. Packing Intel’s 12th-generation processors and a few fun colors to choose from, this is likely to be another popular entry in the lineup.
